ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] As the Everquest Turns
ygData.msgSnippet: I read a statistic that 50% of all female characters played on MMORPG s are played by males. However, I don t think I believe it, because of all the female
ygData.messageBody:
I read a statistic that 50% of all female characters played on MMORPG's are played by males.
 
However, I don't think I believe it, because of all the female characters where I know the player personally, *all* are RL females.  Of course, maybe I just know some weird girls, lol.
 

Tunare Server
Diela,  27 Bard
Diablesse, 15 Enchanter
Sanika, 17 Iksar Shaman

-----Original Message-----
From: LeSamLam@... [mailto:LeSamLam@...]
Sent: Friday, June 15, 2001 9:24 AM
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [EverQuest] As the Everquest Turns

Do things ever happen on your server and you want to tell someone but no one
you know will care?  Does that make sense?  

Maybe it's just because I'm a female and feel the need to gossip.  I don't
know any females in RL that play the game.  Only my husband and his friends.  
They don't care about the gossip of the game.  

The funniest things I see go on between males and females.  Jealously mainly.
 Female A gets jealous when Female B is flirting with Male A who "belongs" to
Female A.  Male C is married to Female C.  Female C's alt is engaged to Male
D.  Male C doesn't like that Female C's alt is engaged to someone else.  
Stuff like that...I find it amusing.  Everquest could turn into this huge
soap opera.  Who cares about loot, who's "cheating" on who?  It's just a game
and sometimes people really take it seriously.  

And since we have a former guide (or where you a GM) on here I have a
question.  When you get married and you take the surname of your
husband...can you hypenate???  I don't like his last name (my RL husband's
character that is).  It doesn't sound "catchy" with my first name.  

Ok and I didn't know you could get divorced in Norrath.  I just find that
funny too.  I might want to marry my RL husband's character just to divorce
him.  He doesn't take out the trash one night...I divorce him in EQ.  LOL.  

Ok so anyway.  

Also, I wonder how many of Norrath marriages have one person being a young 14
to 16 year old male and the other either an old guy pretending to be a female
or an older female.  

What do you think the percentage of actual female players versus actual male
players are in the game?  

Lena
